t21.description: The T21 band of the FIRMS dataset indicating the brightness temperature of a fire pixel using MODIS channels 21/22.

description: Fires detected in a 100sqkm radius around Varanasi over the years 2016 to 2023. The dataset is obtained from Google Earth Engine sourced from MODIS Collection 6 NRT Hotspot / Active Fire Detections MCD14DL.
label: Fires detected in and around Varanasi City
name: varanasi_fires
